promptcards.card: Do you squeeze the end or middle of the toothpaste tube to get it out?
promptcards.action: Write your least favorite word on the back of your hand with a permanent marker.

promptcards.card: Where is the furthest place you’ve traveled?
promptcards.action: Write your middle name on a sticky note with a permanent marker and stick it to your forehead for the rest of the game.

promptcards.card: When do you feel the most at peace?
promptcards.action: Quick! Do 2 laps around the room and sit back down like you’re being chased in Duck Duck Goose.

promptcards.card: What about today has been better than yesterday?
promptcards.action: Stand on one leg until your next turn.

promptcards.card: Do you prefer to have a listening ear or sound advice?
promptcards.action: Wear your shirt either inside out or backwards for the rest of the game.

promptcards.card: What’s one thing people misconceive about you?
promptcards.action: Lay on the floor and make snow angels until your next turn.

promptcards.card: Do you think the player to your left eats more or starves under stress?
promptcards.action: Stand in the corner of the room facing the wall until your next turn.

promptcards.card: Everyone answer! How many hours of sleep do you get on average?

promptcards.action: Whisper something romantic to no one in particular.

promptcards.card: Someone has told you to stop saying sorry and you’ve apologized.
promptcards.action: Pick any word. Yell it loudly.
